Text:
thank you.

where can I donate to Lissie? I want to support her and the band.

If Lissie ever plays a concert in my area, I'll be there.

www.lissie.com has a webstore for t-shirts, buttons and recordings.

It also lists the gigs she will be playing this year.

The next months she'll be playing in England, Ireland, Scotland, the USA and Norway.

Hope you get to see her.
This is really good, i discovered it by chance on Spotify and now *boom* im hooked, cheers for the ul :)
